title: Will classes be rushed?
content:
Last year , I believe the orientation was conducted on Aug 26 and classes have begun on Aug 28. If this is the case for this year as well, won't the classes be rushed? 

Initially it was meant to start on Aug 5. Now based delays of the orientation, it might start on Aug 26..(20 days difference)

Will they not try to complete the portions quickly since they're already running late by 20 days? Won't it be difficult for students to grasp when the syllabus is rushed?

comments.body: Based on what the seniors told, if classes begin late, they will eat into the summer vacations, but won't be rushed. It is still very much possible to begin classes from 5 August. Since currently 25 is last date for refund/doc submission, they can conduct round 2 pessat and round 1 kcet by July end.
nvm DAMN refund date extended lmao

Summer? I don't think most of us had summer itself üòÇ enjoy ur 20 day gap instead of complaining about it, it will only get worse
Good luck
based on what most of the seniors are saying our hams will be steamed lol
Bro what kind of document submission are you talkig about? The one that happened on the day of counselling or something new? Please say cause im sfraid now¬†

[https://pes.edu/important-dates/](https://pes.edu/important-dates/)

[https://pes.edu/documents-to-submit/](https://pes.edu/documents-to-submit/)

You have to submit the docs at PESU before 25 July as of now. Earlier it was 5, then extended till 15, and now 25. Although seniors have told that they accept docs even after the 1st year has started. There have been no mails regarding this so even I was confused and worried.

Dude we got the fee receipt on the day of counselling, do we need to submit that back or what??
And where do we submit the documents, physically at the uni??

You must have got an acknowledgement along with the fee receipt, it shows what documents need to be submitted as they are not ticked. Just to be on the safer side though, have all the documents mentioned in the link above with you and yes, sadly, we do need to go and physically submit the docs. Although a lot of seniors did say that they allow to submit after classes have began. So, have a talk with PESU. Frickers are acting here like students outside Bangalore don't exist.

Ahhaa alright bro so I can submit when I go for the orientation?
